properties.name: match_not_bol
properties.help: The first character is not considered a beginning of line ("^" does not match).

properties.name: match_not_eol
properties.help: The last character is not considered an end of line ("$" does not match).

properties.name: match_not_bow
properties.help: The escape sequence " " does not match as a beginning-of-word.

properties.name: match_not_eow
properties.help: The escape sequence " " does not match as an end-of-word.

properties.name: match_any
properties.help: Any match is acceptable if more than one match is possible.

properties.name: match_continuous
properties.help: The expression must match a sub-sequence that begins at the first character. Sub-sequences must begin at the first character to match.

properties.name: match_prev_avail
properties.help: One or more characters exist before the first one. (match_not_bol and match_not_bow are ignored)

properties.name: format_sed
properties.help: Uses the same rules as the sed utility in POSIX to replace matches.

properties.name: format_no_copy
properties.help: The sections in the target sequence that do not match the regular expression are not copied when replacing matches.

properties.name: format_first_only
properties.help: Only the first occurrence of a regular expression is replaced.
